pkgmetadata.longdescription: Catalogue of Life Toolkit // A programmatic interface to http://sp2000.org.cn, re-written based on an accompanying 'Species 2000' API. Access tables describing catalogue of the Chinese known species of animals, plants, fungi, micro- organisms, and more. This package also supports access to catalogue of life global http://catalogueoflife.org and catalogue of life Taiwan http://taibnet.sinica.edu.tw/home_eng.php?. The development of 'SP2000' package were supported by Biodiversity Survey and Assessment Project of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, China No.2019HJ2096001006 and Yunnan University's Research Innovation Fund for Graduate Students No.2019227.
